questions.question: Why is setting the coordinate system for the reader in this exercise not strictly necessary?
options: FME automatically assigns a coordinate system to all data when you run the workspace.
Setting the coordinate system is not necessary for reprojection.
Setting the coordinate system this way will cause errors.
Many spatial formats store information about the coordinate system they are using. If they have this information, FME will use it to set the correct system when you run the workspace.

questions.question: What window in FME Workbench lets you find the coordinate system for a given feature?
When you added the Reprojector transformer, why was it important to place it before the AreaCalculator?
options: The workspace would run slower if the Reprojector was placed later in the workflow
The data would not be projected if placed after the AreaCalculator
You should always add new transformers near the start of a workspace
You should only calculate areas using data with a projected coordinate system
